snippet: The authorities said the suspect’s father had informed the military about his son’s involvement in the hope of preventing the demolition of the family home.
abstract: Israeli officials report arrest of Palestinian suspected of killing Rabbi and his son in drive-by shooting; suspect's father reported his son's involvement to avoid having family's home demolished, deterrent recently resumed by Israeli military
lead_paragraph: The authorities said the suspect’s father had informed the military about his son’s involvement in the hope of preventing the demolition of the family home.

headline.main: Israeli Forces Arrest Palestinian in Drive-By Shooting in West Bank
headline.print_headline: Israelis Arrest Palestinian in Shooting in West Bank
